content: आपूपिक {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (की|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) [ अपूपठक्] {@--1@} A good maker of अपूप (cakes). {@--2@} Accustomed to eat cakes. {@--3@} Fond of cakes, eating cakes (with benefit). {@--4@} Selling cakes. {@--5@} Baking cakes. {@--6@} Forming an ingredient of cakes, good for cakes (as गुड). --कः A baker; confectioner. --कं A multitude of cakes (अपूपानां समूहः).
